Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
eventListener	text	-
PushingListenerAdapter
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
name	text	-
Name of the listener as known to the adapter
applicationFaultsAsExceptions	boolean	-
onException	options	RETHROW
When an exception happens in the execution of the pipeline, with RETHROW the exception is thrown to the caller. With FORMAT_AND_RETURN the exception is processed by the Adapter.setErrorMessageFormatter(IErrorMessageFormatter) and returned as result-message of the Adapter.
The default is currently RETHROW for backwards compatibility but will become FORMAT_AND_RETURN in a fut
